text: Bakhurebanga mbu nishina shia bafuchililwa. Boola mbu bachamilwa buli bilia ebilayi, nende ebiamwechesia tsisolo okhuyima nende amayoni akayimilwe. Mubechesinjia aka Nyasaye yabechesia, kho lie ashiatsibatilile ne mushisomele elira lia Nyasaye. Ne murie Nyasaye toto Nyasaye ni Omwangu wokhubala
